nodes.bodyText:
Windows has nvidia-smi.exe instead of nvidia-smi. We should only check for that.
See if we can reuse this dictionary from ts_scripts/util.py
nodes.diffHunk:

+    "npm_pkg_version": []
+}

+    # Note: nvidia-smi is currently available only on Windows and Linux
+    smi = 'nvidia-smi'
+    if get_platform() == 'win32':

nodes.bodyText:
sys.platform returns values:



System
platform value




AIX
'aix'


Linux
'linux'


Windows
'win32'


Windows/Cygwin
'cygwin'


macOS
'darwin'



That's why I put 'cygwin'
